markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Admirer's Bouquet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1758)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An _admirer's bouquet_ appears to be a colorful silken handkerchief that exudes a pleasant floral scent until it's picked up, at which point a dozen vibrantly colored long-stemmed flowers appear in the carrier's hand, the stems wrapped in the silk.

<document level="2" id="action-1363" />

<document level="2" id="action-1364" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Admirer's Bouquet
